short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Product importer from top wholesalers to Shopify and Wix store

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
DSA is an automated Shopify and Wix dropshipping app that enables users to import products and reviews from top eCommerce websites, such as Alibaba, Amazon, Aliexpress, Etsy and many others.

DSA, as a lead dropshipping software, offers complete product customization. You can modify product titles, descriptions, prices, images, reviews and other elements before importing them to your Shopify or Wix store. 

Follow these simple steps to import products and reviews to your Shopify and Wix store.

Step 1 - Create a Shopify/Wix store and install the DSA app.
Step 2 - Install the DSA free Chrome Extension. 
Step 3 - Visit a product page on your desired store.
Step 4 - Next, click on the “Add” button on the top left corner of the browser.
Step 5 - After, the DSA app will extract all product data, such as titles, descriptions, images, reviews and many more and provide it in a form.
Step 6 - Finally, customize the data on the form and click the “Import product” button to import the products to your store!

DSA Main Features

Free Extension
1-Click Product Import
Product Customization
Customizable Pricing
Inventory Update
Order Fulfillment
Multi-Supplier Integration
Product Search Dashboard
Review Management
Customer Support and Support Tickets 
Free For Beginners
